nodes.text: Joto Eckels was a field scientist.

He worked with the Obroan Institute and worked on Hoth before being sent to Brath Qella to aide Kroddok Stopa and Josala Krenn in their excavation of the Qella culture. Later he would get the chance to join Jedi Master Luke Skywalker onboard the Teljkon Vagabond.
